author: lecriste
body:
#### PR description:

This PR addresses [this comment](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/32785#pullrequestreview-582435930) from a previously merged PR.
It also introduces a file (`AssociatorTools.h`) that will contain methods shared by different associators. 
No changes are expected in the output.

#### PR validation:

`runTheMatrix -l limited`
title: Reverse dependency
